channel.title: HELP Please! Preventing XLogging
channel.description:
Alright Guys, may I know if there is a tutorial if not please help me with preventing players from Xlogging on my Server. Players been attacking their other account and before they die they will quickly force logout resulting in having drops and still retaining the item on the other account. I have tried to search for the tutorial on how to prevent Xlogging but found neither of them.
I am Using 317 Server Server Base: Delta
Thanks In Advance

item.title: HELP Please! Preventing XLogging
item.dc:creator: @ngjunda ngjunda
item.description:
@ngjunda wrote:

Making client batch file dosent show up wont work too. My client batch file dosent show up, they can just force end the client via task manager.

Read full topic

item.title: HELP Please! Preventing XLogging
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“ngjunda, post:1, topic:375418”]Alright Guys, may I know if there is a tutorial if not please help me with preventing players from Xlogging on my Server. Players been attacking their other account and before they die they will quickly force logout resulting in having drops and still retaining the item on the other account. I have tried to search for the tutorial on how to prevent Xlogging but found neither of them.

I am Using 317 Server
Server Base: Delta

Thanks In Advance[/quote]

Just make it so the client batch file doesn’t show up.

[quote=“ngjunda, post:14, topic:375418”]nope, when xlog are detected they will die and straight away drop their item without duplicating them.

the code should goes like this

i guess you just need to add a code from preventing logging out while in combat.
This code is used in my 317, you should try it. ( add the code in client.java server side )

if(disconnected == true && inCombat) { sM("X-Logging detected, you have died."); faggotdie = 0; currentHealth = 0; isSkulled = true; }
if it doesnt work or gives an error just delete it and compile again.

but i just couldnt get it working[/quote]

if(disconnected == true && inCombat && isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1) == true) { AttackingOn2.sM("Your enemy has X-logged, HE IS HELLA DEAD."); youdied(); }

I don’t reccomend adding this because even if he disconnects during combat it will kill him. Plus this prob won’t even work cause I’m half awake, it’s 4:16am Lawl.

Read full topic

nope, when xlog are detected they will die and straight away drop their item without duplicating them.

the code should goes like this

This code is used in my 317, you should try it. ( add the code in client.java server side )

if(disconnected == true && inCombat) { sM("X-Logging detected, you have died."); faggotdie = 0; currentHealth = 0; isSkulled = true; }
if it doesnt work or gives an error just delete it and compile again.[/quote]

item.title: HELP Please! Preventing XLogging
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

[quote=“ngjunda, post:12, topic:375418”]Nope XLogging means when they PVP and about to die; they will quickly Cross Away the window which can save them from dieing.
Some people use this method to earn money too.[/quote]okay let me open my delta source and do this because you are confusing me. primarily, you to check the the player is fighting another thing like an NPC or opponent player, and if they are, then do not log out?

Read full topic

item.title: HELP Please! Preventing XLogging
item.dc:creator: @ngjunda ngjunda
item.description:
@ngjunda wrote:

Nope XLogging means when they PVP and about to die; they will quickly Cross Away the window which can save them from dieing.
Some people use this method to earn money too.

Read full topic

item.title: HELP Please! Preventing XLogging
item.dc:creator: @ngjunda ngjunda
item.description:
@ngjunda wrote:

[quote=“Phaze One, post:5, topic:375418”][quote author=Xaryza link=topic=471374.msg3447699#msg3447699 date=1293537331]
i guess you just need to add a code from preventing logging out while in combat.
This code is used in my 317, you should try it. ( add the code in client.java server side )

if(disconnected == true && inCombat) { sM("X-Logging detected, you have died."); faggotdie = 0; currentHealth = 0; isSkulled = true; }
if it doesnt work or gives an error just delete it and compile again.
[/quote]

The fuck?[/quote]

dosent that work?

Read full topic
